channel.title: Harry potter signature
channel.description:
I have been using
this avatar:
[img]http://xelios.co.uk/Forum/image.php?u=52&dateline=1370879724[/img]
and this signature:
[img]http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/5028/luvandpowersig.png[/img]
for a very very long time.
I am requesting a new set of avatar/signature please with a similar theme. I want ti to be "magical themed for harry potter similar to what is already shown" I am not picky about renders so use whatever you believe would go best. Be creative. I am not picky about colors either.
I just ask that it is a .png, around a similar size for each ( I think the avvy is like 85x85 and the signature should be less than 500x500 to meet most forum requirements. )
